Detailed Description

GameArena represents a cube of space in which ships, projectiles, and other objects should undergo physics simulation. The GameArena is responsible for storing references to all involved PhysicsObjects, and notifying listeners when new objects are created and destroyed.

Definition at line 326 of file GameObjects.cpp.

Projectile * GameArena::addProjectile ( const Projectile &  projectile  ) 

Adds a projectile to the GameArena. Note: A copy of the passed PhysicsObject is created and stored in dynamic memory.

Returns:
A pointer to the new copy of the PhysicsObject. This pointer will remain valuid for the lifetime of the GameArena.
